scripts.ns.setup: npm uninstall -g nativescript && npm install -g nativescript
scripts.nuki: npm run nuke && npm run setup
scripts.global.installs: npm i -g rimraf && npm i -g typescript
scripts.setup: npm run global.installs && npm run setup.nonglobal
scripts.setup.nonglobal: npm run nuke && npm i && npm run setup.ns.bluetooth && npm run setup.libs && npm run setup.smartdrive.app && npm run setup.study.app
scripts.clean.all: npm run clean && npm run clean.libs && npm run clean.ns.bluetooth && npm run clean.smartdrive && npm run clean.study
scripts.clean.smartdrive: cd apps/smartdrive-app && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.clean.study: cd apps/study-app && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.sd.brad: cd apps/study-app && tsc && tns run android --bundle --device 8606X91120272
scripts.smartdrive.start.android: cd apps/smartdrive-app && tsc && tns run android --bundle
scripts.smartdrive.start.android.hmr: cd apps/smartdrive-app && tsc && tns run android --bundle  --hmr
scripts.smartdrive.start.android.report: cd apps/smartdrive-app && tsc && tns run android --bundle  --env.report
scripts.smartdrive.android.layouts: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.smartdrive.wearos > layout-profile.txt
scripts.smartdrive.android.framestats: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.smartdrive.wearos framestats > framestats.txt
scripts.study.start.android: cd apps/study-app && tsc && tns run android --bundle
scripts.study.start.android.hmr: cd apps/study-app && tsc && tns run android --bundle  --hmr
scripts.study.start.android.report: cd apps/study-app && tsc && tns run android --bundle  --env.report
scripts.study.android.layouts: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.study.wearos > layout-profile.txt
scripts.study.android.framestats: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo com.permobil.study.wearos framestats > framestats.txt
